item.title: Austin PowerShell User Group - From Scripting to Toolmaking: Taking the Next Step With Powershell
item.description: About a month after my presentation of my “From Scripting to Toolmaking: Taking the Next Step With Powershell” session presented at SpiceWorld 2019, I presented the same topic to the Austin PowerShell User Group. Having a longer period of time to give my presentation led to me being a little bit less rushed, and gave me some time to demo some advanced methods for better performance with PowerShell. You can get more details on the presentation in my blog post about SpiceWorld, the video of the presentation here, and the version of the slides from this session here.
